original: Saraṇaṁ dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: saraṇam dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Saraṇaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: saraṇam bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Araṇaṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naaraṇo nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paccayā na araṇaḥ na neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
